amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of those amendments made in order pursuant to an order of the House on September 19, 2001 which are printed on pages H5846-H5848 in the Congressional Record for September 20, 2001.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of amendments en bloc and made in order pursuant to a previous order of the House. The amendments contained in the en bloc proposal consist of the amendments originally proposed by the following Members: Messrs. Hall of Ohio, Manzullo, Lantos, Spratt, Stearns (#50), Weldon of Pennsylvania (#81), Ehrlich, Kirk, Boyd, Farr of California and Lewis of California. Each amendment is as printed in the Congressional Record of September 19, 2001.

action.text: On agreeing to the Stump amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
